document.full_text: from new delhi to shanghai to johannesburg, a flood of cheap handsets from the likes of china's zte and india's micromax is destroying nokia's top position in emerging markets.
document.title: analysis: nimble asian rivals raid nokia's emerging markets turf
lines_and_colors: from new delhi to shanghai to johannesburg, a flood of cheap handsets from the likes of china's zte and india's micromax is destroying nokia's top position in emerging markets.
